[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /obj/misc/fountain.c

Cool fountain with a variable refill rate!

Written by Terano. To use: 1) Clone! 2) Call initialise with appropriate args! 3) Something! 4) Big profits!

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /obj/vessel.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/volumes.h

Method index

initialise(string, int, int)
Initialise the fountain, the path is the path of the reagent to fill the fountain with, the amount to refill per cycle, and the frequency of cycles.
reinitialise(string, int, int)
Initialise the fountain, the path is the path of the reagent to fill the fountain with, the amount to refill per cycle, and the frequency of cycles.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.
